name: Secure Software Development Framework (SSDF)
description: The Secure Software Development Framework (SSDF), SP 800-218, is a set of fundamental, sound, and secure software development practices based on established secure software development practice documents from organizations such as BSA, OWASP, and SAFECode
copyright: With the exception of material marked as copyrighted, information presented on NIST sites are considered public information and may be distributed or copied.
